mapper.select: SELECT ECRM.COMPANY_CD ,ECRM.CRCT_TRMT_NO ,ECRM.SQ_NO ,ECRM.ATCHFILE_ID ,CFI.FILE_DC AS identifier ,CFI.FILE_SQ AS sequence ,CFI.ORGL_FILE_DC AS originalFilename ,CFI.ORGL_FEXTSN_DC AS originalExtension ,CFI.FILE_VR AS fileSize ,CFI.NEW_FILE_DC AS newFilename FROM EH_CRCTTRMT_REQN_MST ECRM INNER JOIN CM_FILE_INFO CFI ON CFI.FILE_DC = ECRM.ATCHFILE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND ECRM.ATCHFILE_ID = #{P_ATCHFILE_ID}
